{  
  "engines": {
    "node": "22.17.0"
  },
  "name": "hotel",

  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Harsh Pal",
  "license": "ISC",
  "description": "",
  "dependencies": {
    "cloudinary": "^1.41.3",
    "connect-flash": "^0.1.1",
    "connect-mongo": "^5.1.0",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.7",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.1",
    "ejs": "^3.1.10",
    "ejs-mate": "^4.0.0",

    "mongodb": "^6.18.0",
    "mongoose": "^8.17.1",
    "multer": "^2.0.2",
    "multer-storage-cloudinary": "^4.0.0",
    "passport": "^0.7.0",
    "passport-local": "^1.0.0",
    "passport-local-mongoose": "^8.0.0"
  }
}

files.content:
<% if(success_msg && success_msg.length) { %>
<%= success_msg %>
<% } %> <% if(error_msg && error_msg.length) { %>
<%= error_msg %>
<% } %>

files.name: footer.ejs
files.content:
© 2023 Hotel Listings. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy Terms of Service Contact Us

files.name: navbar.ejs
files.content:
StaySphere
Explore
New Listing <% if(!currentUser) { %> Sign up Login <% } %> <% if(currentUser) { %> Logout <% } %>

files.name: boilerplate.ejs
files.content:
<%- include('../includes/navbar') %>
<%- include('../includes/flash') %><%- body %>
<%- include('../includes/footer') %>

files.name: edit.ejs
files.content:
<% layout('layouts/boilerplate') %>

Edit Listing

files.name: index.ejs
files.content:
<% layout('layouts/boilerplate') %>

Popular

Bedrooms

Iconic Cities

Mountains

Beach

Amazing pool

Camping

Farms

Arctic

Domes

Himalayas

<% for(let listing of listings) { %>

<%= listing.title %>
₹ <%= listing.price.toLocaleString("en-IN") %> /night
+18% GST

<% } %>

files.name: new.ejs
files.content:
<% layout('layouts/boilerplate') %>

Create New Listing

files.name: show.ejs
files.content:
<% layout('layouts/boilerplate') %>

<%= listing.title %>

Created by: <%= listing.owner ? listing.owner.username : 'Unknown' %>

<%= listing.description %>

Price: ₹ <%= listing.price.toLocaleString("en-IN") %> / night

Location: <%= listing.location %>

Country: <%= listing.country %>

<% if (currentUser && listing.owner && currentUser._id.equals(listing.owner._id)) { %>
Edit Listing
<% } %>
<% if(currentUser) { %>

Leave a Review

<% } %>

All Reviews

<% for (let review of listing.reviews) { %>
@<%= review.author.username %>

><%= review.rating %>

<%= review.comment %>

<% } %>
